data.lyric:
[ti:Love Lies (《爱你，西蒙》电影插曲)]
[ar:Khalid/Normani Kordei]
[al:Love, Simon (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Lies - Khalid/Normani
[00:04.63]Written by：Khalid Robinson/Normani Kordei Hamilton/Tayla Parks/Ryan Vojtesak/Jamil Chammas
[00:09.27]Producer：Charlie Handsome/Digi
[00:13.91]Sorry if it's hard to catch my vibe mmm
[00:19.31]
[00:19.94]I need a lover to trust tell me you're on my side
[00:24.14]Are you down for the ride
[00:26.83]It's not easy for someone to catch my eye
[00:31.55]
[00:33.27]But I've been waitin' for you for my whole d**n life
[00:37.17]For my whole lifetime
[00:40.23]
[00:40.76]Don't be afraid to tell me if you ain't with it
[00:43.39]You ain't with it
[00:44.22]I see you're focused yeah you're so independent
[00:46.73]Independent
[00:47.34]It's hard for me to open up I'll admit it
[00:49.97]I'll admit it
[00:50.73]You've got some sh*t to say and I'm here to listen
[00:53.13]So baby tell me where your love lies
[00:56.11]
[00:57.19]Waste the day and spend the night
[00:59.56]
[01:00.58]Underneath the sunrise
[01:02.80]
[01:03.83]Show me where your love lies
[01:05.88]
[01:07.16]I've been so into your mystery
[01:10.42]
[01:13.85]Is it because of our history
[01:16.84]
[01:17.40]Are you into me
[01:19.97]
[01:20.79]When it feels so good but it's bad for you
[01:24.17]Can't say I don't want it 'cause I know I do
[01:27.28]Come on over I need your company
[01:30.81]Cravin' that synergy
[01:33.44]
[01:34.16]Don't be afraid to tell me if you ain't with it
[01:36.91]You ain't with it
[01:37.72]I see you're focused yeah you're so independent
[01:40.07]Independent
[01:40.85]It's hard for me to open up I'll admit it
[01:43.33]I'll admit it
[01:44.07]You've got some sh*t to say and I'm here to listen
[01:46.55]So baby tell me where your love lies
[01:49.25]
[01:50.51]Waste the day and spend the night
[01:52.87]
[01:53.86]Underneath the sunrise
[01:56.43]
[01:57.14]Show me where your love lies
[02:00.46]Tell me where your love lies
[02:03.02]
[02:03.86]Waste the day and spend the night
[02:06.32]
[02:07.22]Underneath the sunrise
[02:09.79]
[02:10.47]Show me where your love lies
[02:13.54]If you're down don't hide it
[02:17.07]
[02:18.06]Feelin' me you don't gotta deny it
[02:20.33]
[02:21.34]Baby you gon' make me overnight it
[02:23.72]

[02:26.76]If you're down don't hide it yeah
[02:30.80]

[02:40.48]Tell me where your love lies
[02:42.58]Tell me where your love lies
[02:43.85]Waste the day and spend the night

[02:47.26]Underneath the sunrise
[02:49.24]Underneath the sunrise
[02:50.59]Show me where your love lies
[02:52.25]Tell me where your love lies
[02:53.88]Tell me where your love lies

data.trans:
[ti:Love Lies (《爱你，西蒙》电影插曲)]
[ar:Khalid/Normani Kordei]
[al:Love, Simon (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.63]//
[00:09.27]//
[00:13.91]我很抱歉 想要跟上我的节奏的确很难
[00:19.31]
[00:19.94]我需要一个我可以全然信任的爱人 告诉我你就在我的身边
[00:24.14]你准备好与我同行了吗
[00:26.83]想要引起我的注意 那可不是一件容易的事情
[00:31.55]
[00:33.27]但为了你 我已经穷尽了一生来等待
[00:37.17]穷尽了我的一生
[00:40.23]
[00:40.76]不要害怕说出 其实你并不爱我的话语
[00:43.39]你并未感受到我的心意
[00:44.22]我看到你万众瞩目 特立独行
[00:46.73]特立独行
[00:47.34]我承认 对我来说敞开心扉实在太难
[00:49.97]我要承认这一点
[00:50.73]你有好多话要说 我就在这儿聆听
[00:53.13]所以宝贝 告诉我 你的爱在哪里栖息
[00:56.11]
[00:57.19]度过了白昼黑夜
[00:59.56]
[01:00.58]沐浴着日出的光辉
[01:02.80]
[01:03.83]让我知道你的爱藏在哪里
[01:05.88]
[01:07.16]我多么想探寻你的奥秘
[01:10.42]
[01:13.85]是因为我们过去的那些历史吗
[01:16.84]
[01:17.40]你是否属意我
[01:19.97]
[01:20.79]当我感觉如此美妙 但是你却感觉十分糟糕
[01:24.17]无法说出我不爱你的话语 因为我知道我深爱着你
[01:27.28]来我身边吧 我需要你的陪伴
[01:30.81]渴望着你的陪伴
[01:33.44]
[01:34.16]不要害怕说出 其实你并不爱我的话语
[01:36.91]你并未感受到我的心意
[01:37.72]我看到你万众瞩目 特立独行
[01:40.07]特立独行
[01:40.85]我承认 对我来说敞开心扉实在太难
[01:43.33]我要承认这一点
[01:44.07]你有好多话要说 我就在这儿聆听
[01:46.55]所以宝贝 告诉我 你的爱在哪里栖息
[01:49.25]
[01:50.51]度过了白昼黑夜
[01:52.87]
[01:53.86]沐浴着日出的光辉
[01:56.43]
[01:57.14]让我知道你的爱藏在哪里
[02:00.46]告诉我 你的爱在哪里栖息
[02:03.02]
[02:03.86]度过了白昼黑夜
[02:06.32]
[02:07.22]沐浴着日出的光辉
[02:09.79]
[02:10.47]让我知道你的爱藏在哪里
[02:13.54]如果你感觉沮丧 不要试图隐藏
[02:17.07]
[02:18.06]感受我的爱情吧 不要拒绝我的爱意
[02:20.33]

[02:23.72]
